thread.title: Jimmy Kimmel Tweets Donald Trump During - Kimmel Live Tweets Trump At Oscars
thread.title_full: Jimmy Kimmel Tweets Donald Trump During Oscars 2017 - Kimmel Live Tweets Trump At Oscars

author: Lauren Alexis Fisher
title: Jimmy Kimmel Tweets Donald Trump During - Kimmel Live Tweets Trump At Oscars
text:
Jimmy Kimmel took a break from his Oscars hosting duties tonight to tweet President Trump during the live show. Kimmel, who's delivering some fire Trump jabs tonight, called out the President for his tweeting habits and comments about Meryl Streep earlier tonight . But he decided to take things one step further and actually tweet at Trump live on the big screen during the show.
The first tweet cheekily read, "Hey Donald Trump u up?"
Hey @realDonaldTrump u up?
â€” Jimmy Kimmel (@jimmykimmel) February 27, 2017
